ygData.subject: Re: Banks
ygData.msgSnippet: Also put yourself in real life . If I can help a friend, I do. I don t feel there s anything wrong with helping other people, or yourself.
ygData.messageBody:
Also put yourself in "real life". If I can help a friend, I do. I don't feel
there's anything wrong with helping other people, or yourself.


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mark Guckeyson [mailto:mguckeyson@...]
> Sent: Friday, May 28, 1999 12:50 PM
> To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Banks
>
>
> From: mguckeyson@... (Mark Guckeyson)
>
> Out of curiousity, what is your problem with twinking? How does twinking
> degrade your play and or fun? How does it prevent you from doing
> leveling, completing quests, goofing off? If the gear was on a level 50
> PC, how is this better than a level 1 PC?
>
> Just curious, cause personally, I think telling people what they can and
> cannot do with items they own is silly in the first place, and I've
> never noticed any lessening of my enjoyment of the game due to some
> twinking. Well, I've thought to myself "Garsh, it'd sure be nice if *I*
> had that..."
>
> Mark
>
> Lemac Justerian wrote:
> >
> > From: "Lemac Justerian" <lemac@...>
> >
> > Joint bank accounts wouldn't be that great of an idea... For
> the reasons you
> > stated, it would, but it would be abused too easily to help
> *twink* another
> > character up...
> >
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> ONElist: where real people with real interests get connected.
> http://www.onelist.com
> Join a new list today!
>
